00040 #define MENU_OPTION_LEFT_POS 13
00041 
00043 #define MENU_OPTIONS    7
00044 
00046 const struct_menu_option menu_errors[] = {{"Bus resend"},{"No bus sync"}, {"Bus TX queue full"}, {"Bus RX queue full"}, {"Int. comm resend"}};
00047 
00048 
00049 const struct_menu_option menu_misc[] = {{"Reboot"}};
00051 unsigned char current_menu_option_selected[MENU_OPTIONS];
00052 
00054 unsigned char current_menu_level = 0;
00056 unsigned char current_menu_pos   = 0;
00057 
00058 /********* SETUP MENU OPTIONS *********/
00060 const struct_menu_option menu_option_band_selection_mode[] = {{"Manual"},{"Auto"}};
00062 const struct_menu_option menu_option_amp_ptt_output[] = {{"ON"},{"OFF"}};
00064 const struct_menu_option menu_option_radio_ptt_output[] = {{"ON"},{"OFF"}};
00065 /********* SETUP MENUS *********/
00067 const struct_menu_text menu_system_text[] = {
00068 {MENU_POS_BAND_MODE, "Band change", (struct_menu_option *)menu_option_band_selection_mode, 2,MENU_OPTION_TYPE_NORMAL},
00069 {MENU_POS_RADIO_PTT, "Radio PTT", (struct_menu_option *)menu_option_radio_ptt_output, 2,MENU_OPTION_TYPE_NORMAL},
00070 {MENU_POS_AMP_PTT, "Amplifier PTT", (struct_menu_option *)menu_option_amp_ptt_output, 2,MENU_OPTION_TYPE_NORMAL},
00071 {MENU_POS_BACKLIGHT_LEVEL, "Backlight", NULL, 0,MENU_OPTION_TYPE_SCROLL_NUMBERS},
00072 {MENU_POS_SHOW_ACTIVITY, "Network activity", NULL, 0,MENU_OPTION_TYPE_NONE},
00073 {MENU_POS_MISC, "Miscellaneous", (struct_menu_option *)menu_misc, 1,MENU_OPTION_TYPE_NORMAL},
00074 {MENU_POS_SHOW_ERRORS, "Errors", (struct_menu_option *)menu_errors, 0,MENU_OPTION_TYPE_NORMAL},
00075 };
00076 
00079 void menu_show_text(struct_menu_text menu_text) {
00080         //Clear the display
00081         glcd_clear();
00082         
00083         if (menu_text.pos == MENU_POS_SHOW_ERRORS) {
00084                 //Show the "Menu" text
00085                 glcd_text(0,0,FONT_NINE_DOT,menu_text.header,strlen(menu_text.header));
00086         
00087                 //Draw a seperation line between the options and the header
00088                 glcd_line(0,display_calculate_width(menu_text.header,FONT_NINE_DOT,strlen(menu_text.header)),12);
00089                 glcd_line(0,display_calculate_width(menu_text.header,FONT_NINE_DOT,strlen(menu_text.header)),14);
00090                 
00091                 unsigned char flags = event_get_errors();
00092                 unsigned char count = 0;
00093                 
00094                 for (int i=0;i<NR_OF_ERRORS;i++) {
00095                         if (flags & (1<<i)) {
00096                                 glcd_text(MENU_OPTION_LEFT_POS,18+count*10,FONT_SEVEN_DOT,menu_errors[i].text,strlen(menu_errors[i].text));
00097                                 count++;
00098                         }
00099                 }
00100         }
00101         else if (menu_text.pos == MENU_POS_SHOW_ACTIVITY) {
00102                 //TODO: Implement to show the ping list and make it possible to scroll down the list
00103         }
00104         else {
00105                 //Show the "Menu" text
00106                 glcd_text(0,0,FONT_NINE_DOT,menu_text.header,strlen(menu_text.header));
00107                 
00108                 //Draw a seperation line between the options and the header
00109                 glcd_line(0,display_calculate_width(menu_text.header,FONT_NINE_DOT,strlen(menu_text.header)),12);
00110                 glcd_line(0,display_calculate_width(menu_text.header,FONT_NINE_DOT,strlen(menu_text.header)),14);
00111         
00112                 if (menu_text.option_type == MENU_OPTION_TYPE_NORMAL) {
00113                         //Print the different options, mark the current selected with an inverted background
00114                         for (unsigned char i=0;i<menu_text.option_count;i++) {
00115                                 glcd_text(MENU_OPTION_LEFT_POS,18+i*10,FONT_SEVEN_DOT,menu_text.options[i].text,strlen(menu_text.options[i].text));
00116                                 
00117                                 if (current_menu_option_selected[current_menu_pos] == i) {
00118                                         glcd_text(0,18+i*10,FONT_SEVEN_DOT,"->",2);
00119                                 
00120                                         if (current_menu_level == 1) {
00121                                                 glcd_invert_area(MENU_OPTION_LEFT_POS,display_calculate_width(menu_text.options[i].text,FONT_SEVEN_DOT,strlen(menu_text.options[i].text))+MENU_OPTION_LEFT_POS,18+i*10-1,18+i*10+7);
00122                                         }
00123                                 }
00124                         }
00125                 }
00126                 else if (menu_text.option_type == MENU_OPTION_TYPE_SCROLL_NUMBERS) {
00127                         if (menu_text.pos == MENU_POS_BACKLIGHT_LEVEL) {
00128                                 char temp[10];
00129                                 sprintf(temp,"Level %3i",runtime_settings.lcd_backlight_value);
00130         
00131                                 glcd_text(MENU_OPTION_LEFT_POS,18,FONT_SEVEN_DOT,temp,strlen(temp));
00132                                 
00133                                 if (current_menu_level == 1)
00134                                         glcd_invert_area(MENU_OPTION_LEFT_POS,display_calculate_width(temp,FONT_SEVEN_DOT,strlen(temp))+MENU_OPTION_LEFT_POS,18-1,18+7);
00135                                 }
00136                 }
00137         }
00138         
00139         glcd_update_all();
00140 }
00141 
00143 void menu_init(void) {
00144         if (runtime_settings.band_change_mode == BAND_CHANGE_MODE_MANUAL)
00145                 current_menu_option_selected[MENU_POS_BAND_MODE] = 0;
00146         else
00147                 current_menu_option_selected[MENU_POS_BAND_MODE] = 1;
00148 
00149         if (runtime_settings.radio_ptt_output == 1)
00150                 current_menu_option_selected[MENU_POS_RADIO_PTT] = 0;
00151         else
00152                 current_menu_option_selected[MENU_POS_RADIO_PTT] = 1;
00153 
00154         if (runtime_settings.amplifier_ptt_output == 1)
00155                 current_menu_option_selected[MENU_POS_AMP_PTT] = 0;
00156         else
00157                 current_menu_option_selected[MENU_POS_AMP_PTT] = 1;
00158 }
00159 
00161 void menu_reset(void) {
00162         current_menu_pos = 0;
00163         current_menu_level = 0;
00164 }
00165 
00167 void menu_show(void) {
00168         menu_show_text(menu_system_text[current_menu_pos]);
00169 }
00170 
00173 void menu_action(unsigned char menu_action_type) {
00174         if (menu_action_type == MENU_SCROLL_UP) {
00175                 if (current_menu_level == 0) {
00176                         if (current_menu_pos < (MENU_OPTIONS - 1))
00177                                 current_menu_pos++;
00178                         else
00179                                 current_menu_pos = 0;
00180                 }
00181                 else if (current_menu_level == 1) {
00182                         if (menu_system_text[current_menu_pos].option_type == MENU_OPTION_TYPE_NORMAL) {
00183                                 if (current_menu_option_selected[current_menu_pos] < (menu_system_text[current_menu_pos].option_count - 1))
00184                                         current_menu_option_selected[current_menu_pos]++;
00185                         }
00186                         else if (menu_system_text[current_menu_pos].option_type == MENU_OPTION_TYPE_SCROLL_NUMBERS) {
00187                                 if (menu_system_text[current_menu_pos].pos == MENU_POS_BACKLIGHT_LEVEL) {
00188                                         if (runtime_settings.lcd_backlight_value < 100)
00189                                                 runtime_settings.lcd_backlight_value++;
00190 
00191                                         display_set_backlight(runtime_settings.lcd_backlight_value);
00192                                 }
00193                         }
00194                 }
00195                 
00196                 menu_show();
00197         }
00198         else if (menu_action_type == MENU_SCROLL_DOWN) {
00199                 if (current_menu_level == 0) {
00200                         if (current_menu_pos > 0)
00201                                 current_menu_pos--;
00202                         else
00203                                 current_menu_pos = MENU_OPTIONS-1;
00204                 }
00205                 else if (current_menu_level == 1) {
00206                         if (menu_system_text[current_menu_pos].option_type == MENU_OPTION_TYPE_NORMAL) {
00207                                 if (current_menu_option_selected[current_menu_pos] > 0)
00208                                         current_menu_option_selected[current_menu_pos]--;
00209                         }
00210                         else if (menu_system_text[current_menu_pos].option_type == MENU_OPTION_TYPE_SCROLL_NUMBERS) {
00211                                 if (menu_system_text[current_menu_pos].pos == MENU_POS_BACKLIGHT_LEVEL) {
00212                                         if (runtime_settings.lcd_backlight_value > 0)
00213                                                 runtime_settings.lcd_backlight_value--;
00214 
00215                                         display_set_backlight(runtime_settings.lcd_backlight_value);
00216                                 }
00217                         }
00218                 }
00219                 
00220                 menu_show();
00221         }
00222         else if (menu_action_type == MENU_BUTTON_PRESSED) {
00223                 if (current_menu_level == 0) {
00224                         if (current_menu_pos == MENU_POS_SHOW_ERRORS) {
00225                                 unsigned char flags = event_get_errors();
00226                                 
00227                                 for (unsigned char i=0;i<NR_OF_ERRORS;i++)
00228                                         if (flags & (1<<i))
00229                                                 event_set_error(i,0);
00230                                 
00231                                 led_set_error(LED_STATE_OFF);
00232                         }       
00233                         else
00234                                 current_menu_level = 1;
00235                 }
00236                 else {
00237                         current_menu_level = 0;
00238                         
00239                         if (current_menu_pos == MENU_POS_BAND_MODE) {
00240                                 if (current_menu_option_selected[current_menu_pos] == 0)
00241                                         runtime_settings.band_change_mode = BAND_CHANGE_MODE_MANUAL;
00242                                 else if (current_menu_option_selected[current_menu_pos] == 1) {
00243                                         runtime_settings.band_change_mode = BAND_CHANGE_MODE_AUTO;
00244                                 }
00245                                         
00246                                 set_knob_function(KNOB_FUNCTION_AUTO);
00247                         }
00248                         else if (current_menu_pos == MENU_POS_AMP_PTT) {
00249                                 if (current_menu_option_selected[current_menu_pos] == 0)
00250                                         runtime_settings.amplifier_ptt_output = 1;
00251                                 else
00252                                         runtime_settings.amplifier_ptt_output = 0;
00253                         }
00254                         else if (current_menu_pos == MENU_POS_RADIO_PTT) {
00255                                 if (current_menu_option_selected[current_menu_pos] == 0)
00256                                         runtime_settings.radio_ptt_output = 1;
00257                                 else
00258                                         runtime_settings.radio_ptt_output = 0;
00259                         }
00260                         else if (current_menu_pos == MENU_POS_MISC) {
00261                                 if (current_menu_option_selected[current_menu_pos] == 0)
00262                                         bootloader_start();
00263                         }
00264                 }
00265                 
00266                 menu_show();
00267         }
00268 }
